page.title: 15TRANSPORT 2
page.content: We noticed a big difference in the amount of traffic using one of the lanes in the village, compared with the traffic along the main village road "The Street" and the A429 link road between Malmesbury and Chippenham. On a very wet afternoon we recorded the traffic using these three roadways in a given half hour time. Our count showed that 6 vehicles used Hill Hayes Lane; 33 vehicles used The Street,(through the village) and 207 vehicles passed along the A429. We found that most vehicles were private cars; 5 out of the 6 in Hill Hayes Lane; 18 of the 33 along The Street and 176 of the 207 on the A429.Of the total from all three counts (246), 61 were lorries and vans, and 5 included bus,coach and minibus transport.One tractor used The Street.
